bike.description: Kinesium triple-butted alloy, 12 x 142 rear dropouts, 100mm travel mp4 suspension, 1.5 - 1 1/8" tapered head tube, asymmetrical chainstays, cartridge bearing pivots, X-Fusion O2 RL shock with rebound adjust, lock-out and 10mm hardware, replaceable derailleur hanger, Formula 12 x 142mm axle

components.description: X-Fusion Slide 29 RL w/ 15mm axle, lever actuated lockout, Air spring compression, rebound adjust, tapered alloy steerer, 100mm travel
FSA Orbit 1.5 Zero-Stack internal cup, for tapered head tube, 30mm shim stack
Mavic Crossride 29, 15mm front, 12x142mm rear, straight-pull bladed spokes
SRAM X9 rear and X7 front
Avid Elixir 5 hydraulic disc brakes with 180mm front & 160mm rear HS1 rotors
Ritchey Comp Rizer, 710mm x 20mm rise x 31.8mm
